remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法用于生成的可修改副本冻结对象 (或任何对象)。This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen objects (or any object). 为方便起见，此方法将隐藏继承的强类型实现的版本。For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation. 有关详细信息，请参阅。For more information, see .

summary.span: Gets the current value of the animation.

span.span: Gets the current value of the animation.

returns.span: The value this animation believes should be the current value for the property.

span.span: The value this animation believes should be the current value for the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 值`defaultOriginValue`参数取决于组合链中的动画的位置：The value of the `defaultOriginValue` parameter depends on the animation’s position in the composition chain: - 如果动画处于组合链中的第一个位置，它将替换为另一个动画，`defaultOriginValue`是它已替换时该动画的输出。If the animation is in the first position in a composition chain and it replaces another animation, `defaultOriginValue` is the output of that animation at the time it was replaced. - 如果动画处于组合链中的第一个位置，以及任何动画是否存在，若要替换，`defaultOriginValue`是经过动画处理的属性的基值。If the animation is in the first position in a composition chain and no animation exists to replace, `defaultOriginValue` is the base value of the animated property. - 如果此动画不处于组合的第一个位置链接，然后`defaultOriginValue`是由具有该组合链中前一动画的值不。If this animation is not in the first position of a composition chain, then `defaultOriginValue` is the value that is returned by the previous animation in the composition chain that has an that is not . 值`defaultDestinationValue`参数取决于是否没有以前的属性组合层。The value of the `defaultDestinationValue` parameter depends on whether there is a previous property composition layer. - 如果没有以前的属性组合层`defaultDestinationValue`是该层的输出。If there is a previous property composition layer, `defaultDestinationValue` is the output from that layer. - 如果没有以前的组合层，`defaultDestinationValue`是基本值进行动画处理的属性。If there is no previous composition layer, `defaultDestinationValue` is the base value of the property that you are animating. 有关动画组合的详细信息，请参阅[动画和计时系统概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/animation-and-timing-system-overview.md)。For more information about animation composition, see the [Animation and Timing System Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/animation-and-timing-system-overview.md). 有关创建自定义动画类型的详细信息，请参阅[自定义动画概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/custom-animations-overview.md)。For more information about creating custom animation types, see the [Custom Animations Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/custom-animations-overview.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 值`defaultOriginValue`参数取决于组合链中的动画的位置：The value of the `defaultOriginValue` parameter depends on the animation’s position in the composition chain: - 如果动画处于组合链中的第一个位置，它将替换为另一个动画，`defaultOriginValue`是它已替换时该动画的输出。If the animation is in the first position in a composition chain and it replaces another animation, `defaultOriginValue` is the output of that animation at the time it was replaced. - 如果动画处于组合链中的第一个位置，以及任何动画是否存在，若要替换，`defaultOriginValue`是经过动画处理的属性的基值。If the animation is in the first position in a composition chain and no animation exists to replace, `defaultOriginValue` is the base value of the animated property. - 如果此动画不处于组合的第一个位置链接，然后`defaultOriginValue`是由具有该组合链中前一动画的值不。If this animation is not in the first position of a composition chain, then `defaultOriginValue` is the value that is returned by the previous animation in the composition chain that has an that is not . 值`defaultDestinationValue`参数取决于是否没有以前的属性组合层。The value of the `defaultDestinationValue` parameter depends on whether there is a previous property composition layer. - 如果没有以前的属性组合层`defaultDestinationValue`是该层的输出。If there is a previous property composition layer, `defaultDestinationValue` is the output from that layer. - 如果没有以前的组合层，`defaultDestinationValue`是基本值进行动画处理的属性。If there is no previous composition layer, `defaultDestinationValue` is the base value of the property that you are animating. 有关动画组合的详细信息，请参阅[动画和计时系统概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/animation-and-timing-system-overview.md)。For more information about animation composition, see the [Animation and Timing System Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/animation-and-timing-system-overview.md). 有关创建自定义动画类型的详细信息，请参阅[自定义动画概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/custom-animations-overview.md)。For more information about creating custom animation types, see the [Custom Animations Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/custom-animations-overview.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 值`defaultOriginValue`参数取决于组合链中的动画的位置：The value of the `defaultOriginValue` parameter depends on the animation’s position in the composition chain: - 如果动画处于组合链中的第一个位置，它将替换为另一个动画，`defaultOriginValue`是它已替换时该动画的输出。If the animation is in the first position in a composition chain and it replaces another animation, `defaultOriginValue` is the output of that animation at the time it was replaced. - 如果动画处于组合链中的第一个位置，以及任何动画是否存在，若要替换，`defaultOriginValue`是经过动画处理的属性的基值。If the animation is in the first position in a composition chain and no animation exists to replace, `defaultOriginValue` is the base value of the animated property. - 如果此动画不处于组合的第一个位置链接，然后`defaultOriginValue`是由具有该组合链中前一动画的值不。If this animation is not in the first position of a composition chain, then `defaultOriginValue` is the value that is returned by the previous animation in the composition chain that has an that is not . 值`defaultDestinationValue`参数取决于是否没有以前的属性组合层。The value of the `defaultDestinationValue` parameter depends on whether there is a previous property composition layer. - 如果没有以前的属性组合层`defaultDestinationValue`是该层的输出。If there is a previous property composition layer, `defaultDestinationValue` is the output from that layer. - 如果没有以前的组合层，`defaultDestinationValue`是基本值进行动画处理的属性。If there is no previous composition layer, `defaultDestinationValue` is the base value of the property that you are animating. 有关动画组合的详细信息，请参阅[动画和计时系统概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/animation-and-timing-system-overview.md)。For more information about animation composition, see the [Animation and Timing System Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/animation-and-timing-system-overview.md). 有关创建自定义动画类型的详细信息，请参阅[自定义动画概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/custom-animations-overview.md)。For more information about creating custom animation types, see the [Custom Animations Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/custom-animations-overview.md).
